title: Texas State Highway Loop 485
text:
State Highway Loop 485 or Loop 485 is a <a href="Texas">Texas</a> <a href="State%20Highway%20Loop%20416%20%28Texas%29">state highway loop</a> around the city of <a href="Gladewater%2C%20Texas">Gladewater</a>. It runs from <a href="U.S.%20Route%20271%20in%20Texas">US 271</a> in a <a href="clockwise">clockwise</a> direction back to <a href="U.S.%20Route%20271%20in%20Texas">US 271</a> in <a href="Gladewater%2C%20Texas">Gladewater</a>.
History.
Loop 485 was designated on January 30, 1970 from <a href="U.S.%20Route%20271">US 271</a> <a href="east">east</a>ward and <a href="north">north</a>ward to <a href="U.S.%20Route%2080">US 80</a>. On November 20, 1973, Loop 485 was extended northwestward to <a href="U.S.%20Route%20271">US 271</a>, completing its current route.
